protocol_name: RNAqueous with No DNAse, DNA Removal by Acid Phenol:Chloroform
protocol_name_html: RNAqueous with No DNAse, DNA Removal by Acid Phenol:Chloroform
description: March, 2012, based on RNAqueous May 29, 2008 protocol revision C, phenol/chloroform protocol (http://cshprotocols.cshlp.org/content/2010/6/pdb.prot5438.full), ethanol precipitation protocol (http://cshprotocols.cshlp.org/content/2010/6/pdb.prot5440.full)
affiliation: Institute of Evolutionary Biology (CSIC-Universitat Pompeu Fabra)
manuscript_citation: Richter, Daniel J and Fozouni, Parinaz and Eisen, Michael and King, Nicole. Gene family innovation, conservation and loss on the animal stem lineage. 2018;7:e34226 https://doi.org/10.7554/eLife.34226

groups.group_name: Protist Research to Optimize Tools in Genetics (PROT-G)

collections.protocol_name: Transcriptome sequencing of 19 diverse species of choanoflagellates
collections.protocol_name_html: Transcriptome sequencing of 19 diverse species of choanoflagellates

guidelines: To avoid possible RNA degradation, try to work quickly in all steps.

components.data: Place elution solution in a dry bath at 70-80ºC
components.name: Description

source_data.protocol_name_html: RNAqueous with No DNAse, DNA Removal by Acid Phenol:Chloroform
source_data.annotation: Keep the slide inside a petri dish to ensure the noxious smell is contained
source_data.thread_text: Keep the slide inside a petri dish to ensure the noxious smell is contained
source_data.body: Keep the slide inside a petri dish to ensure the noxious smell is contained

components.data: Immediately centrifuge both tubes at max speed in a microcentrifuge at 1ºC for 5 min to pellet unlysed bacteria
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Immediately centrifuge both tubes at max speed in a microcentrifuge at 1ºC for 5 min to pellet unlysed bacteria

components.data: Sample Lysate Preparation
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Sample Lysate Preparation

components.data: During centrifugation, add cover slip to the glass slide and quickly confirm lysis using a microscope.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: During centrifugation, add cover slip to the glass slide and quickly confirm lysis using a microscope.

components.data: Sample Lysate Preparation
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Sample Lysate Preparation

components.data: If cells were lysed, transfer supernatant into two new 1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes. Otherwise, continue with the same tubes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: If cells were lysed, transfer supernatant into two new 1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes. Otherwise, continue with the same tubes.

components.data: Sample Lysate Preparation
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Sample Lysate Preparation

components.data: On ice, pass the lysate in each tube 5 times through a 25 gauge needle fitted to an RNAse-free 1 mL syringe.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: On ice, pass the lysate in each tube 5 times through a 25 gauge needle fitted to an RNAse-free 1 mL syringe.

source_data.annotation: If the cells were not lysed, pass through the needle additional times, and re-check lysis before continuing.
